[Updates]
2020.1.13 - Course: Big Data Analytics. Professor: Thomas Kinsman. This is the advanced course for Data Mining. It includes topics as of all most often popular clustering, classification algorithms. It requires using Python to do projects.
2020.1.13 - Course: Web Services & Services Oriented Computation. Professor: Xumin Liu. This course requires us use Web Services API to write mashup web app, create our own SOAP API, combining MongoDB and do Data Mining. Survey paper is required. This is gonna be fun, for this course is solid for web development.
